mapper.insert: insert into hotelorder (user_id, hotelroomdetail_id, roomNum, peopleNum, tel, price, startTime, endTime, state) values (#{user.id}, #{hotelroomdetail.id}, #{roomNum}, #{peopleNum}, #{tel}, #{price}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{state})
mapper.update: update hotelorder set user_id = #{user.id}, hotelroomdetail_id = #{hotelroomdetail.id}, roomNum = #{roomNum}, peopleNum = #{peopleNum}, tel = #{tel}, price = #{price}, startTime = #{startTime}, endTime = #{endTime}, state = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, hotelroomdetail_id, roomNum, peopleNum, tel, price, startTime, endTime, state from hotelorder where id = #{id}
